meanings.definition: The state of being below the legal age.
meanings.sent1: Many movies have restrictions to prevent underages from watching them.
meanings.sent2: It is illegal to sell alcohol to underages in this country.
meanings.sent3: The underages at the party were trying to sneak in without being noticed.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the law, underages are not considered responsible adults.
meanings.sent5: The store had a strict policy of checking IDs to avoid selling products to underages.

meanings.definition: Young people who are below the legal age.
meanings.sent1: Underages need parental permission for many activities.
meanings.sent2: The event had a curfew to ensure underages left on time.
meanings.sent3: The underages were excited about the upcoming school dance.
meanings.sent4: The park was filled with underages enjoying the sunny day.
meanings.sent5: Underages often face restrictions on what they can do due to their age.
